[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/heft](./heft.md) &gt; [ISharedTypeScriptConfiguration](./heft.isharedtypescriptconfiguration.md) &gt; [additionalModuleKindsToEmit](./heft.isharedtypescriptconfiguration.additionalmodulekindstoemit.md)

## ISharedTypeScriptConfiguration.additionalModuleKindsToEmit property

If provided, emit these module kinds in addition to the modules specified in the tsconfig. Note that this option only applies to the main tsconfig.json configuration.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
additionalModuleKindsToEmit?: IEmitModuleKind[] | undefined;
```
